name: Telewar
description:
Telewar -

Recommended to play in Full Screen Mode.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours. Telewar is a 2d singleplayer, fast paced shooting battle between you and a bunch of cloned AI's. For the theme of the game jam I used screen wrapping so that once you exit one side  of the screen you come out the other. Same thing with the top and bottom screens. This allows for enhanced combat moves. Therefore, the 4 sides of the screen are linked together or joined (Yes, I Improvised on the theme).

How to play:

Use the A and D keys  or the arrow keys to move left and right.

Use the Space bar to Jump.

Use (Rotate) your mouse to aim the player's gun, and cleft click to fire.

Your goal is to shoot as many red enemies as possible without dying.

The more you shoot at them, the more they take action and shoot at you.

Credits: 

All art was made by me.

The Music is the Toon Battle Soundtrack  by TFSui and I downloaded it from the Unity Asset Store. -  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/toon-battle-soundtrack-60676

Sound Effects were obtained from the Wowie Resource Pack made by Jonas Tyroller. - https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack
